titleStmt.title: Ale ale-vated into the ale-titude or, a learned oration before a civill assembly of ale-drinkers, between Paddington and Hogsdon, the 30. of February last, anno millimo quillimo trillimo. By John Taylor.
titleStmt.author: Taylor, John, 1580-1653.

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: "Marsh. 14 1650"; the 51 in the date is crossed out.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
